Description:
"WORK FROM HOME"
This is the perfect location to achieve the ultimate work/life balance.
Providing the ideal environment to work, play and live, this space has it all.
The versatile floor plan gives all the options for an ideal gallery/studio space with fabulous New York Style apartment upstairs.
Rear access from lane way and excellent highly visual street frontage makes this too good to miss.
Building Area approximately 280sqm (C4)*
Land Size 140 sqm (approx.)
Insights: 284 Wellington Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 29 other 2 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Generous Designer Abode
Proudly positioned in the popular “Smith and Co” complex, is this well appointed light filled residence.
Beautifully presented and blessed with good natural light, the apartment boasts spacious open plan living/dining with polished floors and an exciting entertainers terrace overlooking the action that is Smith Street Collingwood/Fitzroy.
Featuring 2 bedrooms (BIR’s), master with full Ensuite and study nook, central bathroom, kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and video intercom.
Showcasing split system heating/cooling, convenient lift access, European style laundry, garage parking and storage space.
The block offers 3 communal gardens, library and located to take in the full lifestyle attributes of Smith and Gertrude Street, parkland and easy access to the CBD.
Perfect entry point first home or the ideal rental investment.
Insights: 204/132 Smith Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 83 other 2 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Impressive Apartment with Street Frontage
Located down a quiet Cul De Sac, this beautiful residence takes full advantage, of the exciting lifestyle mecca that is Urban Collingwood.
Showcasing open plan living/dining, modern kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel Bellisimo appliances, dishwasher and bedroom with BIR’s.
The apartment boasts a very handy ground floor position, cool entertainers courtyard, central bathroom, European style laundry and garage parking.
Combining hardwood floors, split system cooling/heating and intercom system.
Exclusive boutique block and close to parkland, Smith Street’s amazing cafes, restaurants, coffee shops and bars.
Securely Leased at $410pw until 10th May, 2018
Insights: 2/36 Bedford Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 49 other 1 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Instant style and inner-city ease
Characterised by its enhanced features, immaculate condition and boutique surrounds (1 of only 9), this first-floor apartment provides a perfect entry into Collingwood or rewarding investment opportunity along easy access to the best of inner-Melbourne. A ready-made environment of quality and privacy, the apartment's pristine interior boasts one large bedroom (with built-in robes) and stylish ensuite bathroom, open lounge/dining area filled with northerly light and updated kitchen complete with gas cooktop, as well as panel heating and intercom/secure entry. A wonderfully quiet and convenient Collingwood neighbourhood, it's close to cafes and restaurants, vibrant shopping precincts, easy freeway access, trams and trains to the CBD.
Insights: 6/13 Alexander Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 49 other 1 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
The Idyllic Low-Maintenance, Inner-City Lifestyle
Enjoying a quiet position at the centre of the complex with a northerly aspect overlooking the communal courtyard, this immaculately presented and spacious apartment is an exemplar of low-maintenance, inner-city lifestyle. Through the secure intercom entrance and lift access, the apartment comprises a well-appointed galley kitchen with gas cooking and ample storage that services the expansive and light-filled open plan dining and living room flowing onto a generously proportioned north facing balcony, bathroom with Euro laundry, bedroom with BIRs, heating, air-conditioning and secure OSP on title with access via Islington Street. Spoilt with convenience and public transport options, the home is centrally located to all the backstreet cafes, bars an boutiques Collingwood is known for, vibrant Victoria Street restaurants and just a leisurely stroll through the parks of East Melbourne to the hallowed MCG. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 407/3 Hoddle Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 1 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Bold and beautiful with every indulgence
With its brilliant design, cutting-edge style and meticulous attention to detail, this spectacular new executive residence delivers an environment of uncompromising luxury, floorplan flexibility and city-edge prestige. World-class features throughout, the home's light-filled interior showcases 3 large bedrooms (all with fitted robes and deluxe ensuite bathrooms), open-plan living/dining area leading out to a balcony, plus north-facing courtyard garden and spacious top-level deck with city views. Add to this a gourmet kitchen with 60mm stone benchtops, soft-close drawers, European appliances and walk-in pantry, plus Daikin heating and cooling, UPVC double-glazed windows and doors, Australian Hardwood Black Butt flooring and Vic Ash staircase, European laundry and guest powder room (4th WC), as well as a garage parking space via ROW and storage cage. Ultimate modern luxury.
Insights: 157 Hotham Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 1991 and 24 other 3 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
For Immediate Private Sale
This stylish studio apartment is part of the "Haus" development designed by Stoll-Long Architects. In a boutique block of just 24 apartments, offers designer quality appointments and is further enhanced by an upper level position within the complex. Boasting high quality galley style kitchen with open plan living and bedroom area, sublime bathroom/ensuite, stunning balcony opening off the living area with east-facing aspect and great inner city views. Moments from Smith Street vibrant cafe and restaurant precinct, Gertrude and Brunswick Streets with ample public transport and CBD close by. Approx. 47sqm.

Description:
Light And Spacious
This light and spacious single fronted home has been tastefully renovated and extended to
offer three bedrooms, a stunning bathroom with double vanity and deluxe spa, and a contemporary kitchen adjoining the large open plan living room with French doors opening
to a north-facing courtyard. Other features include a split system, reverse cycle air-conditioner and warm polished timber floors. The home is set on a wider than usual allotment providing northerly light to every room and easy off-street parking for two cars.
*NOTE; The Auction is not onsite.
The Auction will be held at Collins Simms office, 286 Queens Parade, Fitzroy North. There will not be an inspection on Auction day.
Peter Bennett : 0419 502 466

Description:
The ideal layout - more than meets the eye
This stunning single front terrace is sure to impress from the moment you enter, as there is nothing to do but move in and enjoy. Renovated throughout with the ideal layout, there are 2 bedrooms (complete with BIRs), an exquisite central bathroom, a separate, light -filled lounge and a sleek modern kitchen and dining space at the rear, complete with European appliances and direct open access to the courtyard garden through wall-to-wall bi-fold doors. This thoughtful renovation also includes attic storage, heating/cooling throughout and access to the rear laneway. Within walking distance of the iconic Smith and Brunswick Street precincts, public transport, Yarra River walks, the Collingwood Children's Farm and parks, this is a superb opportunity to secure a brilliant property in an ideal growth location.
Insights: 159 Keele Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 29 other 2 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
City edge significance since c1861
The surroundings of this elegant contemporary property date from c1861, when the Yorkshire Brewery was at the forefront of Collingwood's emergence as Melbourne's most important industrial quarter. Today, the area is renowned for its leading role as a residential precinct - a fact emphatically illustrated by this dynamic home and its immediate proximity to cafes, retail outlets, tram routes and the CBD. A downstairs living/dining area tells a story of style that features an undercover front terrace and an open plan Caesarstone kitchen. On the upstairs level, the luxury of the generous main bedroom is complemented by built in robes, an immaculate ensuite and a captivating balcony retreat while a pleasing sense of space defines a second bedroom with its own built in robes, served by a central second bathroom. Heating/cooling, under stairs storage and secure garaging add to the attraction of a home where convenience is key and evocative environs convey iconic inner city character.
Insights: 6 Mansard Lane, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 29 other 2 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

In the heart of Collingwood's hip design and cafe precinct, this Elenberg Fraser-designed apartment offers ideal work-from-home living space and brilliant investment potential just 3km from the CBD. Description:
Sensational Starter or Blue-Chip Investment
This amazing Oxford & Peel apartment sets itself apart with its designer interior, meticulous attention to detail and a 7 star sustainability rating. Floorplan comprises of one bedroom, main bathroom including European laundry, open lounge/dining area complemented by a stone-top kitchen, a private east facing balcony, and a secure on title storage room. Add to this hydronic heating, European oak flooring, Miele appliances, oak veneer built in joinery, 2.7 metre high ceilings, double-glazing, quality window furnishings, fitted robes, B-fi high speed internet access, plus bike rack and residents' rooftop deck/BBQ area with sweeping views. Enjoy an amazing inner-city lifestyle with cafe culture and renowned restaurants, vibrant shopping precincts and city-bound trams all at your doorstep.
Apartment size is approx.. 45sqm total.
Estimated rental $380-$400 per week
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 107/20 Peel Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 49 other 1 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Under Offer
Enjoying a revitalised identity with a contemporary makeover while retaining its period lustre, this classic brick Victorian boasting a fresh neutral colour palette presents an excellent opportunity to secure a slice of the increasingly popular and tightly held inner city. With high ceilings and gleaming polished concrete floors, this refurbished home comprises 2 generously proportioned bedrooms with pure wool carpets and BIRs, living room with adjacent dining serviced by a well-appointed kitchen, refreshed bathroom and large courtyard/garden with excellent scope to extend or add OSP (ROW). Exceptionally positioned in Collingwood's eclectic lifestyle precinct, the home is conveniently located to Victoria Park train station, buses, trams and the delights of Smith St.

Description:
LIGHT FILLED LIVING
MOVE IN SPRING 2018
MAXIMISE STAMP DUTY SAVINGS BY JUNE 30TH
Trilby was designed to acknowledge the industrial brick façade at 466 Smith Street, whilst incorporating modern architecture and premium finishes.
Live the inner city life you’ve always wanted to live and enjoy the convenience of the very best Melbourne has to offer — with parks, cafes, restaurants, arts and culture right at your door step.
Trilby makes wonderful use of its liveable spaces, with generous balconies, rooftop garden and smart storage to ensure your inner city apartment living is maximised.
With a choice between a classic or contemporary colour scheme, Trilby apartments feature:
Stainless steel Smeg appliances
Solid oak timber flooring
Natural wool carpets
Sophisticated track lighting
Durable scratch and stain resistant European porcelain benchtops
On-trend aged bronze tapware
Convenient and space efficient storage solutions
Inspect by Appointment, 7 days
Display Suite: 410 Smith Street, Collingwood
Please contact: 1300 651 168
*Images are Artists’ Impression

Description:
Huge warehouse conversion in dynamic lifestyle precinct
Expansive space extending over 2 north-oriented storeys is open for ideas, so get creative in this secure warehouse conversion and become a pivotal player in Collingwood's vibrant fashion and arts precinct. A fabulous fit-out framed by soaring industrial ceilings and polished concrete and timber floors offers superb lifestyle versatility, ensuring you're ready from the get-go to set up as you want in stylish, quality surroundings. A dynamic location near Gertrude/Smith Streets, Fitzroy Gardens, trains, trams and CBD enhances this outstanding opportunity. Featuring remote-control north-side off-street parking for two cars and alfresco area, third car space, video intercom, hydronic heating, Lennox a-c, Miele kitchen (induction/gas cooktop, steam oven and more), bath/powder rooms and an abundance of storage. Note: Commercial 2 Zone.
Insights: 2/9 Byron Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
Hidden Gem
Large open-plan living flowing to a large entertaining balcony are the hallmark features of this two bedroom contemporary apartment idyllically located within walking distance to thriving Smith Street and popular Gertrude Street cafes and restaurants. Stylish interiors include a sleek stone-finished galley-style kitchen with dishwasher, European laundry, two large bedrooms with built-in-robes, master bedroom with ensuite, centrally located second bathroom; spectacular views are captioned from the comfort of the air-conditioned living area (with double glazed doors leading onto the balcony) and city views from the balcony. Eminently appealing to first home buyers or savvy investors, this light-flooded abode also boasts two basement car-spaces, lift access, security entrance foyer, and perfect proximity to Victoria Parade trams and North Richmond train station, MCG and Melbourne's CBD.
Auction Saturday 3 June 2017 at 2:30PM unless sold prior.

Elevated boutique bliss
Occupying a whole floor in a small apartment building, this classy light-filled 80m2
space is ready for you to make your mark above vibrant bustle of Smith Street. Configured as open plan oversized one bed New York style loft,
another bedroom
can easily be added while retaining the industrial vibe.
With city-skyline views,
it features a central bathroom/laundry, well-appointed kitchen and vast light-filled open living/dining area. Add to this a large east-facing terrace,
split-system heating and cooling,
a spacious storeroom and low body corporate charges
(reduced further by an income producing billboard) and Melbourne's coolest cafes and restaurants, and city-bound trams on its doorstep.
Daniel Atsis : 0408 556 927
Insights: 3/108 Smith Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2010 and 49 other 1 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
On-trend living, cafe lifestyle address
This spacious conversion apartment offers the perfect low-maintenance lifestyle, with a tram stop at the door and metres from rejuvenated Smith Street's newest bars, cafes and boutiques. Entered from Otter Street and featuring video intercom security, quality fittings, split-system air conditioning and generous storage, it comprises a good-sized living/dining room open to a well-equipped galley kitchen, three double bedrooms (ensuite and expansive terrace with panoramic northerly views to main), plus smart bathroom and laundry. Warehouse-precinct living at its stylish best!
Insights: 3/284 Smith Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 18 other 3 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Victorian's Easey appeal
From first glance, it's obvious this two bedroom Victorian will find a lot of admirers. In a fashionable locale, the Boom Style home presents a central kitchen/meals/living, lit by northerly windows and sliding doors opening to a deck that leads to a private rear courtyard. Modern touches in the kitchen include a stainless-steel gas cooktop and integrated dishwasher, so staying in and cooking your favourite meal is always an option if you can resist the tempting local restaurants. Comfortable bedrooms include a master with mirrored BIR, the bathroom is complemented by a separate toilet and a laundry, and everything from cafes to trains, trams, parks and shops are nearby. Retaining period grace with soaring ceilings and other attractive touches, this is urban living you'll love.
Insights: 81 Easey Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2019 and 29 other 2 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Dream design with cutting-edge style
Stunning architecture, designer details and world-class features throughout illustrate the appeal of this city-edge showpiece delivering the ultimate executive lifestyle of luxury, privacy and floorplan flexibility. Meticulous attention to detail, the home's vogue interior boasts 3 large bedrooms (all with fitted robes and luxurious ensuite bathrooms), vast open-plan living/dining area complemented by a chef's kitchen with 60mm stone benchtops, soft-close drawers, finest European appliances and walk-in pantry. Add to this Daikin heating and cooling throughout, UPVC double-glazed windows and doors, Australian Hardwood Black Butt timber flooring and Vic Ash solid timber staircase, Euro laundry and guest powder room (4th WC), plus entertainer's balcony and rooftop terrace (both with city skyline views) and garage parking space via ROW. Best of the best!
Insights: 24 other 3 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Indoor/Outdoor Sanctuary with Incredible Views
The sky's the limit to the relaxed private enjoyment, contemporary style and stunning uninterrupted views presented by this compelling penthouse-level warehouse residence. Rare north and west orientation, 2 interconnected decks and amazing 5th floor outlooks to the CBD and northern horizon highlight this unique multi-level retreat blending innovative design, excellent features and flowing indoor/outdoor spaces. Secure and secluded offering 2-car basement parking, video intercom, lift access, 2/3 beautiful big robed bedrooms (main with ensuite plus direct access to tranquil BBQ deck with water feature and garden; 2nd with extra deep storage), versatile mezzanine study, upper level lounge opening to west deck, large open-plan living and dining zone with Smeg equipped kitchen and storage, stylish bathroom, bulkhead air-conditioning, zoned ducted heating, tinted/UV treated windows, Verosol blinds, eco-friendly waxed double-thick floorboards, quality carpets, high ceilings and deck lighting. Superbly positioned near shopping, cafes, bars, galleries, trams, parks and the city.
Insights: 24/125 Oxford Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 18 other 3 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.
